----

Welcome to the website for the Quantitative Text Analysis course. To participate in the course, ensure R and Rstudio are installed first. To do so, follow these steps:

1. Install [R](https://cran.r-project.org/)
2. Install [RStudio](https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/)
3. Install and load [Quanteda](http://quanteda.io/):
    - ``install.packages(quanteda)``
    - ``library(quanteda)``

----

**Notes:**

All the files can also be found on the accompanying Github page: https://github.com/SCJBruinsma/qta-files
